abstractContent.text: In this paper, I revise generalized phrase structure grammar (GPSG) linguistic theory so that it is more tractable and linguistically constrained.

entities.text: generalized phrase structure grammar (GPSG) linguistic theory

abstractContent.text: Revised GPSG is also easier to understand, use, and implement.
I provide an account of topicalization, ex-plicative pronouns, and parasitic gaps in the revised system and conclude with suggestions for efficient parser design.
